eu.cassandra.sim.entities.appliances
Class Appliance

java.lang.Object
  eu.cassandra.sim.entities.Entity
      eu.cassandra.sim.entities.appliances.Appliance

public class Appliance
extends Entity

Class modeling an electric appliance. The appliance has a stand by consumption otherwise there are a number of periods along with their consumption rates.

Nested Class Summary
static class Appliance.Builder
          The Builder class for Appliances.
